about.intro: I’m a junior programmer at Hospital Authority, Hong Kong. I've maintained dozens of MySQL and Microsoft SQL Server instances for varies of projects. I'd describe myself as a relentless problem-solver, a lot of integrity and a willingness to go the extra mile to improve my work.

experiences.subject: Administering a SQL Database Infrastructure
experiences.description: This short yet intensive training course allows me to gain hands-on experiences of Microsoft SQL Server administration, performance tuning and database security.

experiences.subject: BEng in Computer Science
experiences.description: Throughout the 4-year degree program, I have gained both theoretical knowledge like algorithms and system architecture, and practical knowledge like software development.

experiences.subject: Secondary 1 － Secondary 6
experiences.description: The fundamental knowledge of English, Information Technology, Physics and Mathematics lay the foundations of my career as a Database Administrator and Developer.

Right after I graduated, I started working for the Hospital Authority. Despite what my job title suggests, my role is, in fact, a junior system database administrator. I am maintaining 2 architectures of MySQL server instances and provide support to the project teams. Recently, I get my hands on Delphix, a data virtualization platform, which allows provisioning databases in a few minutes with minimal storage overhead.

Versitech is a tech company that is closely related to HKU, the university I was studying. I tested E-Form Filler, an e-form editor which is customized according to the Hong Kong Government's specification to support varies of unique features. I also developed the installer for E-Form Filler using NSIS MUI2, which gave the installer a more professional look. Finally, I reworked a 3-year-old MPF cross-platform mobile application using React Native to give it a modern look and replace the outdated Apache Cordova framework.

Under Dr Tommy Lam, I created a JavaFX to visualize his research result. His research is related to DNA mutations and my program are required to display a large number of DNA sequences. This is the first time I was being introduced to the concept of UI virtualization.

After completing a compulsory C++ course, I was being invited by the instructor to be a volunteer teaching assistant of that course. I assisted her during the tutorial section, answering students questions.

Department of Industrial and Manufacturing Systems Engineering, also known as IMSE, is where I did my 1st part-time job. There, I worked on a cardboard projector/theatre project to promote virtual reality.

references.name: Dr Tommy Lam
references.comment: Matthew is a very intelligent, determined and self-motivated young person who is capable to work independently to achieve specific tasks. He also showed good potential as team leader to manage complex projects.

references.name: Dr Marian Choy
references.comment: His active involvement allows him to gain communication skills and other soft skills. Besides, his maturity and genuine passion to share knowledge with others lay a solid foundation in his pursuit of a professional engineer.

contact.address: 23C Block 14 City One Shatin, Sha Tin, N.T., Hong Kong
